name: Somnarium, by Veronica Park
description:
Welcome to IC Contemporary's fourth digital exhibition: Somnarium by Veronica Park

For a higher quality experience, we recommend downloading the gallery to your computer.

Immerse yourself into the imaginative mind of Veronica Park. Paired with an original soundscape by Matthew Davies, this digital experience places you into four immersive dream terrariums, better know as Somnariums.

Pre-recorded tour of the space is at bottom of the page for our mobile users.

VR coming June 2021

Any donations towards this project help fund our artists and build larger and better exhibitions. More information on this exhibit can be found at www.coltnicastro.com/somnarium

Listen to 'Untrodden' by Matthew Davies here


* DISCLAIMER *

The digital gallery is not operational for mobile use

DO NOT USE SAFARI

For the best browser experience use Google Chrome or Mozilla Firefox 

The program may take some time to load due to the size of the file
